content.raw:
I've updated the following:

1. Corrected code check errors
2. added all member variables to the private data header
3. put the #include for ODEPhysicsPrivate in the right place
4. put forward declarations in the correct places
5. removed GAZEBO_VISIBLE from ODEJointFeedback and ODEPhysicsPrivate
content.html:
I've updated the following:

  1. Corrected code check errors
  2. added all member variables to the private data header
  3. put the #include for ODEPhysicsPrivate in the right place
  4. put forward declarations in the correct places
  5. removed GAZEBO_VISIBLE from ODEJointFeedback and ODEPhysicsPrivate
